tools.name: list_clickup_reference_links
tools.description: Scrape the ClickUp API reference navigation to expose documentation URLs for other tools to follow.

tools.name: fetch_clickup_reference_page
tools.description: Download and sanitize a ClickUp API documentation page. Use this for contextual guidance, not for task data.

path.title: Path
path.description: Path or slug relative to /api, e.g. '/api-reference/tasks/create-task'.

tools.name: get_workspace_hierarchy
tools.description: Retrieve spaces, folders, and lists for a workspace via GET /team/{team_id}/space and related endpoints.

refresh.title: Refresh
refresh.description: Force a refresh instead of serving cached hierarchy results.

team_id.title: Team Id
team_id.description: Workspace/team identifier. Uses default_team_id from config when omitted.

tools.name: create_task
tools.description: Create a new ClickUp task via POST /list/{list_id}/task. Provide either list_id or list_name to target the list.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags to apply to the task.

parent.title: Parent
parent.description: Parent task ID for creating subtasks.

status.title: Status
status.description: Status to assign to the task.

list_id.title: List Id
list_id.description: List identifier where the task will be created.

team_id.title: Team Id
team_id.description: Team identifier overriding the session default.

due_date.title: Due Date
due_date.description: Due date in natural language or Unix time.

assignees.title: Assignees
assignees.description: Users to assign (IDs, emails, or names).

list_name.title: List Name
list_name.description: List name (resolved within the workspace hierarchy).

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: Start date in natural language or Unix time.

description.title: Description
description.description: Plain text description for the task.

tools.name: create_bulk_tasks
tools.description: Create multiple ClickUp tasks concurrently using the standard single-task endpoint.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: Collection of task payloads to create.

list_id.title: List Id
list_id.description: Default list identifier applied when tasks omit listId.

options.title: Options
options.description: Batch processing configuration controlling concurrency, retries, and error handling.

team_id.title: Team Id
team_id.description: Team identifier overriding the session default.

list_name.title: List Name
list_name.description: Default list name applied when listId is omitted.

tools.name: update_task
tools.description: Update an existing ClickUp task via PUT /task/{task_id}. Provide task_id directly or resolve by name plus list context.

list_id.title: List Id
list_id.description: List identifier used when resolving taskName.

task_id.title: Task Id
task_id.description: Identifier of the task to update.

team_id.title: Team Id
team_id.description: Team identifier overriding the session default.

list_name.title: List Name
list_name.description: List name used when resolving taskName.

task_name.title: Task Name
task_name.description: Task name (requires list context for disambiguation).

tools.name: update_bulk_tasks
tools.description: Update multiple tasks concurrently via the bulk service layer.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: Collection of task updates to apply.

options.title: Options
options.description: Batch processing configuration controlling concurrency, retries, and error handling.

team_id.title: Team Id
team_id.description: Team identifier overriding the session default.

tools.name: add_tags_bulk_tasks
tools.description: Add tags to multiple tasks concurrently via the bulk service layer.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: Collection of tag assignments to apply.

options.title: Options
options.description: Batch processing configuration controlling concurrency, retries, and error handling.

team_id.title: Team Id
team_id.description: Team identifier overriding the session default.

list_id.description: List identifier to fetch tasks from.

team_id.title: Team Id

list_name.title: List Name

due_date_gt.description: Filter tasks due after this timestamp.

due_date_lt.title: Due Date Lt
due_date_lt.description: Filter tasks due before this timestamp.

list_name.title: List Name

task_name.title: Task Name

tools.name: create_list
tools.description: Create a list inside a ClickUp space via POST /space/{space_id}/list.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the list to create.

team_id.title: Team Id
team_id.description: Team identifier overriding the session default.

due_date.title: Due Date
due_date.description: Default due date for tasks created in this list.

tools.name: create_list_view
tools.description: Create a custom view for a list via POST /list/{list_id}/view.

divide.title: Divide
divide.description: Optional secondary grouping/divide configuration mirroring ClickUp's UI settings.

columns.title: Columns
columns.description: Column configuration listing core and custom fields to display (use cf_ prefixes for custom fields).

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: Optional filters object following ClickUp's view filtering schema. Include field/operator/value definitions plus optional groups to preload filter chips.

list_id.title: List Id
list_id.description: Identifier of the list that will host the view. Optional when listName is provided.

sorting.title: Sorting
sorting.description: Sorting options. Supply the same structure as the ClickUp API accepts for view sorting fields.

team_id.title: Team Id
team_id.description: Workspace/team identifier overriding the session default for list lookups.

grouping.title: Grouping
grouping.description: Grouping preferences controlling swimlanes. Provide keys like field, dir, collapsed, and ignore.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: General view settings (show_subtasks, show_assignees, collapse_empty_columns, etc.).

list_name.title: List Name
list_name.description: Name of the list used to resolve the identifier when listId is unknown.

view_type.title: View Type
view_type.description: View type to create (e.g. list, board, calendar).

team_sidebar.title: Team Sidebar
team_sidebar.description: Sidebar configuration controlling the visible assignee buckets and quick filters.

server_info_crawled.name: ClickUp MCP Server (Python)
server_info_crawled.overview: Create, update, and search tasks, lists, and spaces in your ClickUp workspace. Automate project workflows with authenticated access to the full ClickUp API. Explore available operations and documentation to build precise, reliable automations.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the list to create.

team_id.title: Team Id
team_id.description: Team identifier overriding the session default.

tools.name: create_list_view
tools.description: Create a custom view for a list via POST /list/{list_id}/view.

divide.title: Divide
divide.description: Optional secondary grouping/divide configuration mirroring ClickUp's UI settings.

columns.title: Columns
columns.description: Column configuration listing core and custom fields to display (use cf_ prefixes for custom fields).

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: Optional filters object following ClickUp's view filtering schema. Include field/operator/value definitions plus optional groups to preload filter chips.

list_id.title: List Id
list_id.description: Identifier of the list that will host the view. Optional when listName is provided.

sorting.title: Sorting
sorting.description: Sorting options. Supply the same structure as the ClickUp API accepts for view sorting fields.

team_id.title: Team Id
team_id.description: Workspace/team identifier overriding the session default for list lookups.

grouping.title: Grouping
grouping.description: Grouping preferences controlling swimlanes. Provide keys like field, dir, collapsed, and ignore.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: General view settings (show_subtasks, show_assignees, collapse_empty_columns, etc.).

list_name.title: List Name
list_name.description: Name of the list used to resolve the identifier when listId is unknown.

view_type.title: View Type
view_type.description: View type to create (e.g. list, board, calendar).

team_sidebar.title: Team Sidebar
team_sidebar.description: Sidebar configuration controlling the visible assignee buckets and quick filters.

configSchema.title: ClickUpConfig

base_url.title: Base Url
base_url.description: Root URL for the ClickUp REST API. Change this for sandbox or future versions.

api_token.title: Api Token
api_token.description: ClickUp personal token or OAuth token used for Bearer authentication.

auth_scheme.title: Auth Scheme
auth_scheme.description: Authentication scheme for the Authorization header. Use 'personal_token' for legacy API keys, 'oauth' for OAuth access tokens, or leave as 'auto' to detect based on the token format.

default_headers.title: Default Headers
default_headers.description: Additional headers to include with every ClickUp API call (e.g. enterprise headers).

default_team_id.title: Default Team Id
default_team_id.description: Optional team identifier that is used when a tool does not explicitly include a team identifier.

request_timeout.title: Request Timeout
request_timeout.description: Timeout (in seconds) used for outbound requests to ClickUp.

configSchema.description: Session configuration supplied by Smithery users.

registry_entry.description: Create, update, and search tasks, lists, and spaces in your ClickUp workspace. Automate project workflows with authenticated access to the full ClickUp API. Explore available operations and documentation to build precise, reliable automations.
